title: Should I cut my hair with a trimmer or scissors so that it is not Qaza? | Sh. Assim Al Hakeem - JAL
transcript: which is best it's all the same as long as you're trying your best to make them the same level not to have hazard or to shave one part and leave one part and it's all looks even when i say even it doesn't mean that you have to bring a ruler and start measuring how long each strand of hair is no but it's not really really light here and heavy here it's normal a haircut there's no problem in that
